segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Namaste, main SBI bank ke fraud department se baat kar raha hun. Aapka naam kya hai?

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Haan, main Rajesh Kumar hun. Kya problem hai?

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Sir, aapke account mein suspicious activity detect hui hai. Kya aapne koi online transaction ki hai aaj?

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Nahi, maine koi transaction nahi ki hai. Kya hua hai?

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Sir, aapke account se 50,000 rupees ka transaction hua hai. Aapko OTP share karna hoga verification ke liye.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Main OTP share nahi kar sakta. Aap directly bank se contact karein.
